Translations.Text: Xinshimen que yi chenggong.
Tamen [xinshi] zai libai zhong shi qiangong de [zhu],
tamen shi bi kai [an la suo jinzhi de] yiqie wang tan de,
tamen shi wan na tian ke [zhu] de,
tamen shi baochi zhencao de,
dui tamen de qizi huo tamen suo yongyou de nunu nu fu chuwai, yinwei zai zhe zhong qingkuang xia, tamen shi bu shou zebei de;
fan zai ci zhi wai zai you sheqiu zhe, zhexie ren que shi chaoyue fadu zhe;
tamen zhongshi yu tamen de xintuo he mengyue,
tamen anshi jin shou bai gong.
Zhexie ren que shi jicheng zhe.
Tamen jiang jicheng tiantang [leyuan], tamen jiang yong ju qizhong.
Wo que yi yong nitu de jinghua chuangzao ren [ru a dan].
Ranhou, wo ba ta zaocheng yidi jingye fang zai yige anquan chu [zigong],

Ranhou, wo ba na di jingye zaocheng ningxie, ranhou, wo ba ningxie zaocheng rou tuan [peitai], ranhou, wo ba rou tuan zaocheng guge, ranhou, wo gei guge bao shang jirou, ranhou, wo ba ta zaocheng ling yige chuangzaowu. Zansong an la zhifu! Ta shi zui hao de chuangzao zhe.
Cihou, nimen you jiang siwang.
Ranhou, nimen zai fuhuo ri you jiang bei fuhuo.
Wo que yi zai nimen shangmian zaole qi ge tian [huo qitiao guidao], wo jue bu hushi suo zao wu.
Wo cong tiankong yidingliang jiangxia yushui, bing rang ta zan liu zai dadi zhong, wo dique nenggou shouhui ta.
Wo jie ci wei nimen shengchan chu ye zao yuan he putao yuan, nimen congzhong ke huode xuduo shuiguo, gong nimen shiyong.
Wo chuangzaole yi zhong [ganlan] shu, shengzhang zai xinai shanshang, neng chan you, ke gong shi zhe zuo tiaowei yong.
Zai shengchu zhong, dui nimen que youyi zhong jiaoxun. Wo shi nimen yinyong na chuzi tamen fu zhong de ruzhi, ciwai, nimen congzhong hai ke huode xuduo yichu, nimen ke chi tamen de rou.
Nimen keyong shengchu [zai lu shang] he chuan [zai shuishang] yunzai.
Wo que yi paiqian nu ha [zhu] qu jiaohua ta de zuren. Ta shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Nimen dang chongbai an la, chu ta wai, nimen zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei ma?”

Ta de zuren zhong bu xinyang zhe de shoulingmen shuo:“Zhe zhishi tong nimen yiyang de fanren, ta xiang bi nimen youyue. Jiaru an la yiyu [zhu][paiqian shizhe], ta yi ding hui jiangxia tianshi. Women meiyou ting shuo women de zuxian shidai you zhe zhong shi.
Ta zhishi yige zhongle mo de ren, nimen [zhanshi] dengdai ta yiduan shijian ba!”
Ta [nu ha] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni yuanzhu wo, yinwei tamen fouren wo.”

Yushi wo qishi ta [shuo]:“Ni dang zai wo de jianshi xia yi wo de qishi [yindao] jianzao yi sou chuan. Dang wo de mingling lailin er shui cong simianbafang yong chu shi, ni dang cong mei zhong dongwu zhong ge na yi dui [gong de yu mu de] fang zai chuan li, bing rang ni de jiaren [tong ni] yiqi shang chuan, fan xingfa yi panjue zhe [ji gai shou chengfa zhe] chuwai. Ni buyao wei bu yi zhe er [gao sheng] qiqiu wo, tamen bi jiang bei yan si.
Dang ni he yu ni tongchuan zhe shang chuan zuo wen shi, ni dang [qidao] shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, shi ta zhengjiu women tuo li liao bu yi de minzhong.”
[Dang ni xiachuan shi], ni dang [qidao] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo zai yige bei [ni] ci fu di difang denglu, ni shi zui shanyu shi ren denglu de.”
Ci zhong [zhi nu ha de zuren bei yan si] que you xuduo jixiang, wo ruci kaoyan renlei.
Ranhou, zai tamen [bei yan si] zhihou, wo you chuangjianle qita shidai.

Wo cong tamen ben zuren zhong gei tamen paiqianle yi wei shizhe [bing shuo]:“Nimen dang chongbai an la, chu ta wai, nimen zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [an la] ma?”

Ta [na wei shizhe] de zuren zhong de shoulingmen bu xinyang bing fouren houshi [yu an la] de xiang hui, wo ceng shi tamen zai jinshiguo shechi de shenghuo, tamen shuo:“Zhe zhishi tong nimen yiyang de fanren, ta chi nimen suo chi de, ta he nimen suo he de.
Jiaru nimen fucong tong nimen yiyang de fanren, name, nimen bi shi sunshi zhe.
Ta xunuo nimen dang nimen si hou bian cheng chentu he kugu shi, nimen zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo [zhu] ma?
Tai yaoyuanle! Nimen suo bei xunuo de tai yaoyuanle!
Chule women jinshi de shenghuo wai, zai mei bie dele [zhu], women si, women sheng, dan women jue bu hui bei fuhuo.
Ta zhishi yige jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan de ren, women jue bu xiangxin ta.”
Ta [na wei shizhe] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni yuanzhu wo, yinwei tamen fouren wo.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Tamen hen kuai jiu hui houhui de.”
Xingfa gongzheng de chengzhile tamen, wo shi tamen bian chengle feiwu. Bu yi de minzhong xiaoshi [bei huimie]le.
Ranhou, zai tamen [bei huimie] zhihou, wo you chuangjianle qita shidai.
Renhe minzu dou bu hui zai qi dingqi qian xiaowang, ye bu hui yanhuan.

Ranhou, wo jixu paiqian wo de shizhemen. Mei dang yige minzu de shizhe lai dao gai minzu shi, tamen jiu fouren ta. Suoyi, wo shi tamen xiangji bei huimie, bing shi tamen chengwei [hou ren xiqu jiaoxun de zhenshi] gushi. Bu xinyang de minzhong xiaoshi [bei huimie]le.
Ranhou, wo paiqian mu sa he ta di gege ha lun daizhe wo de jixiang he mingzheng,
qu jiaohua falao ji qi shoulingmen, dan tamen aoman, tamen shi aoman de minzhong.
Tamen shuo:“Nandao women xinyang tong women yiyang de liang ge fanren, er ta lia de zuren que shi shunfu women de ma?”
Tamen fouren ta lia, jieguo bei huimiele.
Wo que yi ci gei mu sa jingdian, yibian tamen zunxing zhengdao.
Wo shi ma'er ya zhizi [er sa] he ta de muqin [ma'er ya] chengwei yi zhong jixiang, wo shi ta lia anju yu gaoyuan shang yige you xiliu de yinbi chu.
Shizhemen a! Nimen dang chi [yiqie hefa er] jiamei de shiwu, nimen dang xingshan. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, wo que shi quanzhi de [zhu].
Nimen de zhege zongjiao [zhu][yisilan jiao], yuan shi yige tongyi de zongjiao, er wo [an la] shi nimen de zhu, suoyi, nimen dang jingwei wo.
Dan tamen [youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu deng] wei jiaoyi er ba ziji de zongjiao [yisilan jiao] fencheng zongpai, mei pai dou wei ziji suo yongyou de jiaoyi er zhanzhanzixi.
Ni rang tamen zhanshi chenni yu tamen de mi wu zhong ba!
Nandao tamen renwei wo shi tamen zai caichan he ernu fangmian zengduo [zhu],
shi wo [zai jinshi] jiyu ci gei tamen fu fen [er tamen zai houshi meiyou fu fen] ma? Bu, tamen bu lijie.
Fan yin kongju er jingwei tamen de zhu zhe,
fan quexin tamen de zhu de jixiang zhe,
fan bu gei tamen de zhu shezhi renhe huoban zhe,
fan xinhuai weiju er shishe shou ci wu zhe [zhu], tamen quexin tamen bi jiang gui dao tamen de zhu nali qu.
Zhexie ren zhengxian xingshan, tamen shi zui xian huode shan bao de.
Wo zhi rang yige ren an qi nengli fudan. Wo youyi bu chanshu zhenli de jingdian, tamen jiang bu shou kuidai.
Qishi, tamen de xin dui lijie zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] shi chenni yu mangcong zhong de, ciwai, tamen hai you xuduo e xing yao zuo,
zhidao wo yi xingfa chengzhi tamen zhongguo shechi shenghuo de ren shi, tamen cai turan hujiu.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Jintian nimen buyao hujiu! Nimen jue buneng dedao wo de yuanzhu.
Youren que yi xiang nimen songduguo wo de qishi, dan nimen xuanzhong bugu.
Nimen aoman buxin [mai jia de gu lai shen yi jiaotu wei ziji neng juzhu zai jin si fujin er jiao'ao zi da], yeli huche ta [“gulanjing”].”
Shi tamen wei shensi [an la de] yanyu [“gulanjing”] ne? Haishi weiceng jiang gei tamen zuxian de [jingdian] jianglin tamenle?
Haishi tamen shangwei zhenzheng renshi tamen de shizhe [mu sheng], yin'er tamen fouren ta ne?
Haishi tamen shuo ta you feng bing ne? Qishi, ta yi wei tamen dai lai zhenli [ren zhu du yi,“gulanjing” he yisilan jiao deng], dan tamen da duoshu ren haishi yanwu zhenli.
Jiaru zhenli fuhe tamen de siyu, name, tiandi wanwu biding du huimiele. Bu, wo yi ba dui tamen de jiaohui jiang gei tamen, dan tamen haishi beiqi dui tamen de jiaohui.
Nandao ni [mu sheng] xiang tamen suoqu baochou ma? Qishi, ni de zhu de huibao cai shi zui hao de. Ta shi zui shanyu ciyu jiyang zhe.
Ni dique neng zhaohuan tamen zunxing zhengdao [zhu][yisilan jiao].
Fan bu xinyang houshi zhe, tamen que shi beili zhengdao de.
Jiaru wo ci min tamen, jiechu tamen suo shou de zainan, name, tamen biding guzhi de zai tamen de beini zhong gengjia mangcong.
Wo [an la] que yi yong xingfa chengzhi tamen, dan tamen dui tamen de zhu [an la] haishi bu qiangong, bu qian shun.
Zhidao wo wei tamen dakaile yidao yanxing zhi men shi, tamen cai turan chengwei juewang [houhui] de.
Shi ta [an la] wei nimen chuangzaole er [tingjue] mu [shijue] xin [siwei], dan nimen hen shao gan'en.
Shi ta ba nimen chuangzao zai dadishang,[fuhuo ri] nimen dou jiang bei jihe dao ta nali qu [zhu].
Ta neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si, zhouye de jiaoti gui ta zhangguan [zhu]. Nandao nimen hai buming li ma?
Bu, tamen shuole leisi qian ren suo shuo dehua.
Tamen shuo:“Nandao women si hou bian cheng chentu he kugu shi, women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo ma?
Yiqian, women he women de zuxian que yi shouguo zhe zhong jinggao, dan zhe zhishi qian ren de fengsu xiguan eryi.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Da di ji qizhong de yiqie dou shi shei de? Jiaru nimen zhidao.”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Dou shi an la de.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu xingwu ma?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shei shi qi ge tian de zhu he weida baozuo de zhu?”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Shi an la.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [an la] ma?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shei zhangwo wanwu de zhuquan? Shei baohu wanwu er ziji bu xu baohu? Jiaru nimen zhidao.”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Shi an la.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Na nimen zenme hai bei mihuo [er beili zhengdao] ne?”
Bu, wo yi ci gei tamen zhenli [yisilan jiao], dan tamen [bu xinyang zhe] que shi shuohuang zhe.

An la meiyou renhe ernu [zhu], ye meiyou renhe zhuzai neng yu ta tongdeng, fouze, mei ge zhuzai biding duzhan ziji suo chuangzao de, biding yousheng lie bai. Zanmei an la chaojue! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
Zanmei quanzhi yiqie kan bujian zhi wu he kan de jian zhi wu de zhu [an la] chaojue! Zhigaowushang de ta [an la] chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Ruguo ni yiding yao rang wo kanjian tamen suo bei jinggao de [xingfa],
wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao shi wo chengwei bu yi de minzhong.”
Wo dique you nengli rang ni kanjian wo suo jinggao tamen de [xingfa].
Ni dang yi shan chu e [yidebaoyuan]. Wo zui zhidao tamen suo wangyan de.
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni baohu wo mian zao emomen de youhuo.
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni baohu wo buyao rang tamen [emo] jiejin wo [zhu].”
Zhidao tamen [gei an la shezhi huoban zhe] zhong youren mianlin siwang shi, ta cai shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo fanhui chenshi ba!
Yibian wo zuo wo suo yiliu de shangong.” Jue bu keneng! Zhe zhishi ta geren de yuanwang. Zai tamen de qianmian you yige pingzhang, zhidao tamen bei fuhuo zhi ri.
Dang haojiao chui xiang shi, zai na ri, tamen zhi jian jiang bu cunzai qinshu guanxi, ye buneng huxiang xunwen.
Shei de shangong zhong [zhu], zhexie ren que shi chenggong zhe;
shei de shangong qing, zhexie ren que shi shi ziji shou sun zhe, tamen jiang yong ju huo yu zhong.
Huo jiang shao tamen de lian, tamen zai huo yu li jiang tong de ziyaliezui.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nandao meiyou ren xiang nimen songduguo wo de qishi [“gulanjing”] er zao nimen fouren ma?”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women de boming zhansheng womenle, women shi mi wu de minzhong.
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni cong huo yu li fang women chuqu ba! Jiaru women zai fanzui, women que shi bu yi zhe.”
Ta [an la] jiang shuo:“Nimen liu zai huo yu li shouru ba! Nimen buyao dui wo shuohua.”
Wo de puren zhong youxie ren chang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women xinyangle, qiu ni kuanshu women, qiu ni ci min women. Ni shi renci zhong zuirenci de.”
Dan nimen ba tamen [musilin de xinyang] dang xiaobing, jingchang chaoxiao tamen, yizhi tamen shi nimen wangle zan nian wo [zhu].
Jintian, youyu tamen [zai chenshi] jianren [zhu], wo que yi baochou tamen, tamen que shi chenggong zhe.
Ta [an la] jiang shuo:“Nimen zai da dishang [chenshi] douliule ji nian?”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women zhi douliule yitian huo bu dao yitian, qing ni xunwen shan jisuan zhe ba!”
Ta [an la] jiang shuo:“Nimen zhi douliule hen duan de shijian, jiaru nimen zhidao.
Nandao nimen renwei wo hao wu mudi er chuangzao nimen, nimen jue bu hui gui dao wo zheli lai ma?”
An la shi zhigaowushang zhe, shi zhuzai he zhenli, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu, ta shi zungui baozuo de zhu.
Shei ji qiqiu an la, you qiqiu qita hao wu zhengju de zhuzai, ta jiang zai ta de zhu [an la] nali shou qingsuan. Bu xinyang zhe shi jue bu hui chenggong de.
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuanshu [wo], qiu ni ci min [wo]. Ni shi renci zhong zui renci de.”
[Zhe shi]“gulanjing” de yi zhang, wo jiang shi ta bing shi ta chengwei falu. Wo zai qizhong jiang shile xuduo mingxian de jixiang, yibian nimen jieshou quangao.

Yin fu he jian fu [zhu], nimen dang ge da ta lia yibai bian. Nimen buyao yin lianmin ta lia er bu zhixing an la guiding de xingfa, jiaru nimen xinyang an la he mori. Dang rang yi huo xinshi jianshi ta lia suo shou de xingfa.
Jian fu zhi neng qu yin fu huo bai ouxiang de nuren, yin fu zhi neng jia jian fu huo bai ouxiang de nanren. Zhe zhong hunpei dui xinshimen shi bei jinzhi de.
Fan wugao zhenjie funu er buneng tigong si ge zhengren zhe, nimen dang ge da tamen bashi bian, bingqie, nimen yongyuan buneng jieshou tamen de jianzheng, yinwei zhexie ren que shi zui ren.
Fan cihou huiguo zi xin zhe chuwai, yin wei an la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Fan wugao ziji de qizi, chu benren wai you meiyou qita zhengren zhe, ta de zhengju shi yi an la zuozheng si ci, zhengming ta shuo dique shi shihua.
Di wu ci shi zuozheng: Jiaru ta shuo de shi huanghua, ta yuan shou an la de xingfa.
Ta [bei wugao de qizi] yao bimian shou [shi] xing [zhu], ta bixu yi an la zuozheng si ci, zhengming ta [ta de zhangfu] shuo dique shi huanghua.
Di wu ci shi zuozheng: Jiaru ta [ta de zhangfu] shuo de shi shihua, ta yuan shou an la de xingfa.
Jiaru meiyou an la dui nimen de enhui he ci min,[an la zao jiu chengfa nimenle]. An la que shi jieshou huiguo de, zui ruizhi de.

Naxie feibang [zhu][mu sheng zhi qi a yi sha] zhe que shi nimen zhong de yi huo ren. Nimen buyao renwei zhe dui nimen shi jian huaishi, qishi, zhe dui nimen shi jian haoshi. Tamen zhong mei ren dou jiang shou ziji suo fanzui e de chengfa, tamen zhong de zuikui bi shou zhongda de xingfa.
Dang nimen tingjian [feibang] zhe jian shi shi, weisheme nannu xinshimen budui ziji ren zuo shanyi de caixiang bing shuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de feibang ne?”
Weisheme tamen [feibang zhe] buneng tigong si ge zhengren lai zhengming zhe jian shi ne? Tamen buneng tigong [si ge] zhengren, zai an la kan lai, zhexie ren que shi shuohuang zhe.
Jiaru meiyou an la zai jinshi he houshi dui nimen de enhui yu ci min, nimen bi yin canyu zaoyao ④ er shou zhongda de xingfa.
Dangshi, nimen daotingtushuo, nimen dui ci bing bu zhixiao, nimen yiwei zhe shi jian xiaoshi, zai an la kan lai, zhe que shi jian dashi.
Dang nimen tingjian yaoyan shi, weisheme nimen bu shuo:“Women bu gai jiang zhe zhong hua. Zanmei ni [an la] chaojue! Zhe shi yige ji da de feibang.”
An la jinggao nimen, jiaru nimen shi xinshi, nimen yongyuan buneng zai jiang zhe zhong hua.
An la wei nimen chanming ta de qishi. An la shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.
Naxie xihuan zai xinshi zhi jian chuanbo yinluan zhi shi zhe, tamen zai jinshi he houshi bi shou tongku de xingfa. An la zhidao, er nimen bu zhidao.
Jiaru meiyou an la dui nimen de enhui he ci min,[an la zao jiu chengfa nimenle]. An la que shi ren'ai de, te ci de.

Xinshimen [zhu] a! Nimen buyao zhuisui emo de bufa. Shei zhuisui emo de bufa, emo bi ming shei gan choushi he xie'e. Jiaru meiyou an la dui nimen de enhui he ci min, nimen zhong jue meiyou yiren hui shi qingbai de, dan an la shi tasuo yiyu zhe qingbai. An la shi quan wen de, quanzhi de.

Nimen zhong shou ci enhui he caifu zhe jue buneng fashi yong bu jieji qinqi, pinmin he wei an la zhidao qianyi zhe. Tamen yingdang yuanliang he kuanrong. Nandao nimen bu xiwang an la kuanshu nimen ma? An la shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Fan wugao zhenjie qingchun de nu xinshi zhe [zhu], tamen zai jinshi he houshi dou jiang zao qianze. Tamen [zai houshi] hai yao shou zhongda de xingfa.
Zai na ri, tamen de she he shoujiao dou jiang fanzheng tamen cengjing suo zuo de.
Zai na ri, an la jiang shi tamen huode tamen ying de de baochou, tamen jiang zhidao an la que shi zui mingbai de zhen zai.

Huai nuren [zhu] pei huai nanren, huai nanren pei huai nuren; hao nuren pei hao nanren, hao nanren pei hao nuren. Zhexie ren [hao nan hao nu] yu tamen [huai nan huai nu] suo wangyan de shi hao wu guanxi de, tamen [hao nan hao nu] jiang huode kuanshu he fengfu de jiyang [leyuan].
Xinshimen a! Zai nimen huode xuke bing xiang zhuren zhu an qian [zhu], nimen buyao jinru bieren de jiamen, zhe dui nimen shi zui hao de, yibian nimen jieshou quangao.

Jiaru nimen faxian jiazhong wu ren [yingda], name, nimen zai huode xuke qian, buyao jinru bieren de jiazhong [zhu]. Jiaru youren dui nimen shuo:“Qing nimen huiqu ba!” Nimen jiu gai huiqu. Zhe dui nimen shi zui chunjie de. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quanzhi de,
nimen [wei huo xuke] jinru wu ren juzhu er nimen you caiwu zai limian de fangwu, dui nimen shi wu zui de. Fanshi nimen suo gongkai de he yincang de, an la quan zhi dao.
Ni dang gaosu nan xinshimen: Tamen ying jiangdi tamen de shixian [bu kan weijin zhi wu] bing zhe zhu tamen de xiu ti, zhe dui tamen shi zui chunjie de. Fanshi tamen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.

Ni dang gaosu nu xinshimen: Tamen ying jiangdi tamen de shixian [zhu 1][bu kan weijin zhi wu] bing zhe zhu tamen de xiu ti. Tamen bu ying xuanshi tamen de zhuangshi, chufei shi ziran luchu de. Tamen yingyong [mian] sha [zhu 2] zhe zhu tamen de xiongbu [lian, bozi he shenti deng], bu ying xuanshi tamen de zhuangshi [mei se], chufei shi dui tamen de zhangfu, huo tamen de fuqin, huo tamen de zhangfu de fuqin, huo tamen de erzi, huo tamen de zhangfu de erzi, huo tamen de xiongdi, huo tamen de xiongdi de erzi, huo tamen de jiemei de erzi, huo tamen de [musilin] funu, huo tamen suo yongyou de nunu nu fu, huo wu xingyu de nan pu, huo shangwei dong [nan] nuxing shi de ertong. Tamen bu ying duo tamen de jiao, yi yin ren zhuyi tamen suo yincang de zhuangshi. Xinshimen a! Nimen dang quanti xiang an la huizui, yibian nimen chenggong.
Nimen dang shi nimen zhong danshen de nannu tong nimen de nupu zhong shanliang de nannu jiehun. Jiaru tamen pinqiong, an la jiang yi ta de enhui shi tamen fuyu. An la shi fuyu de [zhu], quanzhi de.

Wuli jiehun zhe, tamen ying baochi zhencao, zhidao an la yi ta de enhui shi tamen fuyu. Nimen suo yongyou de nupu zhong, fan yaoqiu ding shushen qiyue zhe, nimen dang yu ta [ta]men ding yue, jiaru nimen zhidao ta [ta]men shi ke xin de. Nimen dang ba an la ciyu nimen de caifu song xie gei tamen. Jiaru nimen de nunu yao baochi zhencao, name, nimen buyao weile xunqiu jinshi shenghuo de liyi er qiangpo tamen maiyin. Ruguo youren qiangpo tamen [maiyin], zai tamen bei qiangpo hou, an la [dui tamen] que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Wo que yi jiang shi nimen xuduo mingbai de jixiang, yiji nimen qian ren de lizheng he dui jingwei zhe de quangao.

An la shi tiandi de guangming. Ta de guangming haobi bi ge zhong de yi zhan mingdeng. Na zhan mingdeng zai yige boli zhao nei, nage boli zhao youru yi ke canlan de mingxing. Na zhan mingdeng shi yong yi ke jixiang de ganlan shu you ranzhe de, ta ji bushi dongfang de [ru zaochen de riguang], ye bushi xifang de [ru xiawu de riguang]. Ta de you jishi bu yu huo jiechu, yeshi faguang de, guang shang tian guang. An la yindao tasuo yiyu zhe zouxiang guangming. An la wei renlei shele xuduo biyu, an la shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.
[Ci guang] zai an la zhunxu jianzao de yixie fangwu [zhu 1][qingzhensi] zhong, bing zhunxu zai qizhong zan nian ta de zun ming. Zhaoxi dou zai qizhong zansong ta [zhu 2][an la] de,
shi yixie nanren. Maoyi he maimai meiyou shi tamen shuhu zan nian an la [zhu], jin shou bai gong he wan na tian ke. Tamen weiju na xinjingdanzhan de rizi [fuhuo ri].
Yibian an la yi tamen de zui hao shangong baochou tamen, bing ci gei tamen geng duo de enhui. An la wuxian liang ci gei tasuo yiyu zhe [zhu].

Zhiyu bu xinyang zhe, tamen de shangong youru shamo zhong de shen jing, kou ke zhe yiwei na shi shui, deng ta daoda nali shi, ta shenme ye meiyou zhaodao, zhi faxian an la zai nali. An la ba ta ying shou de [huoxing] gei ta. An la shi qingsuan shensu de.

Huozhe [bu xinyang zhe de qingkuang] youru yige ren zai wangyang dahai de chongchong hei'an zhong zhengzha er bei botao yanmo, zai ta shangmian ji you botao, yeyou wuyun, hei'an chongchong, jihu shenshou bujian wuzhi. An la wei ci gei shei guangming, shei jiu meiyou guangming.

Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? Tiandi jian de yiqie ji zhanchi [feixiang] de niao dou zansong an la [zhu]. Ta [an la] dique zhidao wanwu [dui ta] de qidao he zansong. Fanshi tamen suo zuo de, an la shi quanzhi de.
Tiandi de zhuquan shi an la de, wei an la shi zuihou de guisu.

Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ma? An la shi yun man man yidong, ranhou shi qi jiehe, ranhou shi qi jiju, ranhou, ni jiu kanjian yu cong yun zhong jiangxia. Ta cong tiankong, cong rushan de yunceng nei jiangxia bingbao, jie ci chengfa tasuo yiyu zhe, bi kai tasuo yiyu zhe. Shandian jihu duo zoule shijue.
An la shi zhouye lunliu [zhu], dui yanguang minrui de renmen, ci zhong que youyi zhong jianjie.

An la cong shuizhong chuangzao yiqie dongwu, qizhong youyong fubu paxing de, youyong liang zu xingzou de, yeyou yong si zu xingzou de. An la chuangzao tasuo yiyu de. An la dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.
Wo que yi [zai zhe bu “gulanjing” zhong] jiang shi xuduo mingbai de jixiang. An la yindao tasuo yiyu zhe zunxing zhengdao [yisilan jiao].
Tamen [wei xinzhe] shuo:“Women xinyang an la he shizhe [mu sheng]le, women fucongle.” Ran'er, cihou tamen zhong youxie ren you beilile, zhexie ren bushi xinshi.
Dang tamen bei zhaohuan qu xinyang an la [de “gulanjing”] ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], yibian ta [mu sheng] wei tamen panjue shi, tamen zhong youxie ren mashang jiu [jujue bing] bi kaile.
Jiaru tamen youli, tamen jiu qiangong de lai jian ta [mu sheng].
Zhe shi tamen de xinzhong you bing ne? Haishi tamen zai huaiyi? Huo shi tamen haipa an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] hui dui tamen [panjue] bugong? Bu, zhexie ren que shi bu yi zhe [zhu].

Dang xinshimen bei zhaohuan qu xinyang an la [de “gulanjing”] ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], yibian ta [mu sheng] wei tamen panjue shi, tamen chang shuo:“Women tingjianle, women fucongle.” Zhexie ren que shi chenggong zhe [houshi yong ju leyuan].
Shei fucong an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], jingwei an la, jinzhi jinze, name, zhexie ren que shi chenggong zhe.

Tamen yi an la fachu tamen zui zhuangyan de shiyan: Jiaru ni [mu sheng] mingling tamen [chuzheng], tamen biding [wei an la zhidao] chuzheng. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen buyao fashi,[nimen de zhe zhong] fucong shi zhongsuozhouzhi de. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la que shi che zhi de.”

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen dang fucong an la, dang fucong shizhe [zhu][mu sheng]. Jiaru nimen beili, name, ta [mu sheng] zhi fuze tasuo shoutuo de zeren [mingbai di chuanda an la de qishi], nimen ye zhi fuze nimen suo ying jin de zeren. Jiaru nimen fucong ta [mu sheng], nimen bian huode zhengdao. Shizhe [mu sheng] zhi fuze mingbai di chuanda qishi.”

An la yingxu nimen zhong xinyang bing xingshan zhe: Ta bi shi tamen chengwei dadishang de jiren zhe, youru ta shi tamen de qian ren jicheng da di yiyang; ta bi shi tamen you nengli luxing ta wei tamen er xuanze de zongjiao [yisilan jiao]; ta bi yi ping'an qudai tamen de kongju; tamen zhi neng chongbai wo, jue bu gei wo shezhi renhe pei wu. Cihou shei bu xinyang, zhexie ren que shi beini zhe.
Nimen dang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, fucong shizhe [mu sheng], yibian nimen shou [an la de] ci min.
Ni jue buyao renwei bu xinyang zhe zai da dishang neng taotuo [an la de chengfa], tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Guisu zhen elie!

Xinshimen a! Nimen suo yongyou de nupu he nimen zhong shangwei chengnian de ertong, jiao tamen zai san ge shiduan xiang nimen qingqiu xuke [ciqian tamen buke jinru nimen de woshi]: Chen li qian; nimen zhongwu tuo qu yifu [xiuxi] shi; xiao li hou. Zhe shi nimen de san ge yinsi [luoti] shijian. Chu ci zhi wai, nimen he tamen huxiang wanglai shi wu zui de. An la ruci wei nimen chanming ta de qishi. An la shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.

Dang nimen de haizi zhang dao chengnian shi [zhu], jiao tamen qingqiu xuke, youru bi tamen nian zhang de ren suo qingqiu xuke de yiyang. An la ruci wei nimen chanming ta de qishi. An la shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.

Zhiyu chaoguo shengyu nianling er bu yuan jiehun de funu, jiaru tamen bushi weile xuanyao zhuangshi, name, tamen tuo qu waiyi, dui tamen shi wu zui de. Buguo, ruguo tamen neng baochi yanjin [bu tuo qu waiyi], na dui tamen shi zui hao de. An la shi quan wen de, quanzhi de.

Dui mangren shi wu zui [xianzhi] de, dui quezi shi wu zui [xianzhi] de, dui bingren shi wu zui [xianzhi] de, dui nimen ziji yeshi wu zui [xianzhi] de, wulun nimen shi zai nimen ziji jiali yongcan, haishi zai nimen de fuqin de jiali, huo nimen de muqin de jiali, huo nimen de xiongdi de jiali, huo nimen de jiemei de jiali, huo nimen de shubai de jiali, huo nimen de gumu de jiali, huo nimen de jiufu de jiali, huo nimen de yimu de jiali, huo nimen zhangguan yue shi de jiali, huo nimen de pengyou de jiali, wulun nimen [yu tamen] yiqi yongcan, haishi [yu tamen] fenkai yongcan, dui nimen dou shi wu zui de. Dang nimen jinru jiali shi, nimen dang xiang jiali ren zhu an [zhu][ji shuo se lia mu], yin wei an la guiding de zhuci shi jixiang meihao de. An la ruci wei nimen chanming ta de qishi, yibian nimen lijie.

[Zhen] xinshi zhishi naxie quexin an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] de ren. Dang tamen tong ta [mu sheng] yiqi shangtao gongwu shi, tamen zai xiang ta qingqiu xuke qian, jue bu hui shanzi li qu. Fan xiang ni qingqiu xuke zhe, zhexie ren que shi duxin an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] de ren. Dang tamen yin sishi xiang ni qingqiu xuke shi, ni keyi zhunxu tamen zhong ni suo manyi zhe. Ni dang qiu an la kuanshu tamen. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Nimen buyao ba shizhe [mu sheng] dui nimen de zhaohuan dang zuo nimen bici jian de [putong] zhaohuan. An la dique zhidao nimen zhong [jiegu er wei jing xuke jiu] liu zou de ren. Suoyi, rang naxie weikang ta [mu sheng] de mingling de ren jingti, yimian zaihuo jianglin tamen, huo tongku de xingfa jianglin tamen.

Xuzhi, tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi an la de, ta dique zhi dao nimen de qingkuang. Dang tamen bei zhao dao ta [an la] nali di na ri, ta jiang ba tamen cengjing suo zuo de gaosu tamen. An la shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.
Zansong ta [an la] zhifu! Shi ta ba bianbie zhen wei de zhunze [“gulanjing”] jiang gei ta de puren [mu sheng], yibian ta [mu sheng] zuo zhong shijie de jinggao zhe.
Tiandi de zhuquan shi ta de. Ta meiyou ernu, meiyou renhe huoban neng canyu ta de zhuquan [zhu]. Ta chuangzao wanwu bing jingque yuding wanwu [de mingyun].

Tamen she ta er chongbai qita shenling, naxie shenling buneng chuangzao renhe dongxi, tamen ziji yeshi bei chuangzao de; naxie shenling ji buneng wei ziji zhangguan huo fu, ye buneng zhangguan shengsi he fuhuo.
Bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing”] zhishi ta [mu sheng] suo niezao de huangyan, you xuduo ren ceng bangzhuguo ta.” Tamen que yi xing bu yi, que yi shuo huangmiu zhi yan.
Tamen shuo:“[Zhe shi] qian ren de fengsu xiguan, ta [shi ren] chaolu xialai, youren zhaoxi xiang ta koushu.”
Ni shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi quanzhi tiandi aomi de zhu [an la] jiang shi de. Ta que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.”
Tamen shuo:“Zhe wei shizhe [mu sheng] zenme ye [tong women fanren yiyang] chifan, zai ji shi shang xingzou ne? Weisheme bu xiang yi wei tianshi gei ta [mu sheng], pei ta yiqi zuo jinggao zhe ne?
Huozhe wei shen me bu jiang caibao gei ta ne? Huozhe wei shen me ta meiyou yizuo gong ziji shiyong de guoyuan ne?” Bu yi zhe shuo:“Nimen suo zhuisui de zhishi yi wei zhongle mo de ren.”
Ni dang guancha tamen ruhe na ni lai juli! Tamen yi wu ru qitu, suoyi, tamen zhao bu dao renhe zhengdao.
Zansong ta [an la] zhifu! Jiaru ta yiyu, ta hui ci gei ni bi zhe geng hao de——zhu heliuguo de leyuan, bing [zai leyuan li] ci gei ni gongdian [zhu].
Bu, tamen fouren fuhuo de shijian, wo yi wei fouren fuhuo de shijian zhe zhunbeile liehuo.
Dang huo yu cong yuan chu kanjian tamen shi, tamen jiang tingjian ta de nuhou sheng he paoxiao sheng.
Dang tamen bei tie lian shuan zai yiqi touru huo yu zhong de xiazhai zhi di shi, tamen jiang zai qizhong wei zao huimie er aiqiu.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Jintian nimen buyao wei zao yici huimie er aiqiu, nimen dang wei zao duo ci huimie er aiqiu.”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Shi zhe [huo yu de xingfa] geng hao ne? Haishi yingxu gei jingwei zhe de yong ju de leyuan geng hao?” Zhe [leyuan] shi tamen [jingwei zhe] ying xiangshou de baochou he guisu.
Fanshi tamen xiang yao de, tamen zai leyuan li dou neng dedao, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi ni de zhu bi shixian de nuoyan.

Zai na ri, ta [an la] jiang ba tamen ji tamen she an la er chongbai de [ouxiang] dou jihe qilai. Ta jiang shuo:“Shi nimen [naxie ouxiang] shi wo de zhexie puren mi wu de? Haishi tamen ziji mishi zhengdao de?”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Zanmei ni chaojue! Women bu gai she ni er ling xuan baohu zhe, dan ni ceng shi tamen he tamen de zuxian xiangle, zhidao tamen wangle jiaohui, chengwei zao huimie de minzhong.”

[An la jiang shuo]:“Naxie ouxiang que yi fouren nimen suo shuo de, nimen jue buneng taotuo [nimen ying shou de] xingfa, ye de bu dao renhe yuanzhu. Nimen zhong shei xing bu yi, wo bi shi ta changshi zhongda de xingfa.”

Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, fanshi wo suo paiqian de shizhe, tamen dou [tong fanren yiyang] chifan he zai ji shi shang xingzou. Wo shi nimen huxiang kaoyan, nimen neng rennai ma? Ni de zhu [dui wanwu] shi quan shi de. (“Bu hali sheng xun shilu” di si juan di 557B duan)
